body_html:
Approaching the problem without reading the bazel docs was really not a good idea.
Worked like a charm after, and also managed to use a LINKER_SCRIPT to expose only needed functions, thus reducing the size of the library.

body:
Approaching the problem without reading the bazel docs was really not a good idea.
Worked like a charm after, and also managed to use a LINKER_SCRIPT to expose only needed functions, thus reducing the size of the library.
